title: Fashe
description: A stylish e-commerce platform designed to offer a seamless shopping experience with a clean and modern user interface.

title: Task Manager
description: A full-stack task management application that helps users organize their daily tasks and boost productivity. The project includes features for adding, editing, and tracking tasks with a clean dashboard.

title: Yummy
description: A recipe sharing platform that showcases a variety of dishes with detailed instructions and beautiful imagery.

title: Restaurant
description: A modern website for a restaurant, featuring an elegant menu, booking form, and a photo gallery. The design is clean and responsive, providing a professional and inviting online presence.

title: Imane Portfolio
description: A professional portfolio website for a client named Imane. The site is designed to showcase her work in a minimalist and clean layout, highlighting her projects and skills effectively.

title: Morocco
description: A travel blog-style website dedicated to showcasing the beauty and culture of Morocco. The site features a gallery of photos and details about popular destinations.
